messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: English Shinsengumi book
messages.msgSnippet: ... I got the publisher information from someone at Ridgeback in answer to my query on publishing date and if they were taking advance orders. I didn t notice
messages.messageBody:
Kevin Closson wrote:

>That would make sense for it to be published by
>Tuttle. I talked with the guy from Ridgeback Press
>sometime back and he told me that it wouldn't be
>published by them, but by a bigger publisher.
>
>Kevin
>
>
I got the publisher information from someone at Ridgeback in answer to
my query on publishing date and if they were taking advance orders. I
didn't notice anything on the website for Tuttle though.

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: English Shinsengumi book
messages.msgSnippet: That would make sense for it to be published by Tuttle. I talked with the guy from Ridgeback Press sometime back and he told me that it wouldn t be published
messages.messageBody:
That would make sense for it to be published by
Tuttle. I talked with the guy from Ridgeback Press
sometime back and he told me that it wouldn't be
published by them, but by a bigger publisher.

Kevin

Romulus Hillsborough, in his email to me, did not mention which
publishing company would be producing his Shinsengumi book.

> Ok so I'm too lazy to check this by going through past messages but I
> found out last night that the upcoming book by Romulus Hillsborough on
> the Shinsengumi is being published by Tuttle Publishing not Ridgeback
> Press as his other books were.
>

> was mentioned in conjunction but I'm not sure so if you've seen this
> publisher info before we'll just it blame it on "the fish".
>

> Barbara Sheridan

messages.subject: English Shinsengumi book
messages.msgSnippet: Ok so I m too lazy to check this by going through past messages but I found out last night that the upcoming book by Romulus Hillsborough on the Shinsengumi is
messages.messageBody:
Ok so I'm too lazy to check this by going through past messages but I
found out last night that the upcoming book by Romulus Hillsborough on
the Shinsengumi is being published by Tuttle Publishing not Ridgeback
Press as his other books were.

I know the book was mentioned on list before and I thought Ridgeback
was mentioned in conjunction but I'm not sure so if you've seen this
publisher info before we'll just it blame it on "the fish".

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
